cgcloud__Payment_Tactic_Fund__c.name: cgcloud__Payment_Tactic_Fund__c
cgcloud__Payment_Tactic_Fund__c.description: This object stores the relationship between the Fund and Payment Tactic junction objects.

LastActivityDate.description: Most recent date on which a user last performed an action on the record.

cgcloud__Amount__c.description: Average amount of a specific tactic.

cgcloud__Funding_Percent__c.description: Value that drives the amount distribution for the fund.

cgcloud__LE_Revenue__c.description: Total value of KPI that's referenced in the Fund Template’s LE Revenue field,.

cgcloud__LE_Volume__c.description: Total value of the KPI that's referenced in the Fund Template’s LE Volume field.

cgcloud__Payment_Age__c.description: Reads the Payment Age off of the related Payment record. This field is helpful for reporting purposes.

cgcloud__Payment_Anchor__c.description: References to the name of the Payment Anchor with which the Payment Tactic is associated.

cgcloud__Payment_Status__c.description: Status of the payment to which this record is assigned.

cgcloud__Payment_Type__c.description: Reads the Payment Type off of the related Payment record. This field is helpful for reporting purposes.

cgcloud__Promotion_Anchor__c.description: References to the Tactic Anchor name with which the Payment Tactic is associated.

cgcloud__Promotion_Tactic__c.description: References to the Promotion Tactic with which the Payment Tactic is associated.
